problems.author: Mubarak Aouda
problems.question: Which of the following is a vector quantity?
problems.detailed: Velocity has both magnitude and direction, making it a vector, unlike speed, distance, or time.

problems.author: Mubarak Aouda
problems.question: What is the resultant of two equal vectors of magnitude 5 units pointing in opposite directions?
problems.detailed: Two equal vectors in opposite directions add up to the zero vector, giving a resultant magnitude of 0.

problems.author: Mubarak Aouda
problems.question: If vector A = (3, 4) and vector B = (-3, -4), what is A + B?

problems.author: Mubarak Aouda
problems.question: A vector has magnitude 10 pointing east. Which is the opposite vector?
problems.detailed: The opposite vector must point west with the same magnitude of 10.

problems.author: Mubarak Aouda
problems.question: Which operation results in a scalar when applied to two vectors?
problems.detailed: The dot product (scalar product) produces a scalar value.
